price: (15) O mankind, you are those in need of Allāh, while Allāh is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
arabic: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ أَنتُمُ ٱلۡفُقَرَآءُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ وَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu antumu al-fuqarāu ilā al-lahi wal-lahu huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
